definition: tonic food (food considered to be particularly healthful)/to eat such foods
to eat/food/animal feed/eclipse
to feed (a person or animal)
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
the benefits of medicine are not as great as those of good nutrition

sentences.english: People with liver complaints need to be especially careful about what they eat.
sentences.chinese: 患有肝病的人吃东西要特别小心，尤其是在食补方面。

sentences.english: People to illnesses and physical, longevity, the need to Sibu.
sentences.chinese: 人要祛病强身，延年益寿，需要食补。

sentences.english: The custom of prescribing tonic foods for a healthier life also spills over into the catering industry.
sentences.chinese: 将食补作为养生之道的习俗也影响到了公共饮食业。

sentences.english: Sibu peace, raise the body, bodily injury aphrodisiac.
sentences.chinese: 食补平安，养身体，壮阳药伤身体。

sentences.english: Stewed brews are common medicinal dishes.
sentences.chinese: 苦味的酿制饮料是普遍的食补方法。

definition: medicinal dietary supplement that helps build up one's health
